snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [167] Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
snippet.description:
Http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

The First in the Strike series. The original Desert Strike - Return to the Gulf on Sega Mega Drive / Genesis.  All the strike games are fondly remembered and the franchise should be braught back.

It was ported to pretty much all the consoles out at the time, including Master system which looks great everything concidered.  The Ultimate version however fell on the Amiga.  With its extra gfx and sounds it makes this version abit bland and lacks abit of immersion.

Im not sure if its an emulation issue, but the Engine sound is way to low and the chaingun hit sound is unbearable so make sure your volume isnt too high ;)

Its not a very optimal playthrough.  There are Objectives I didnt need to do (like capturing all commanders instead of needed 1) and in campaign 3, I was caryying the two news reporters for most of the mission whch slowed mission progression.

00:00:00 Intro + Campaign 1 Air Superiority
00:22:44 Campaign 2 Scud Buster
00:56:05 Campaign 3 Embassy City
01:31:39 Campaign 4 Nuclear Storm -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
